item.description:
Host: Claire P. cell @ 603-247-0897
RAIN CANCELS THIS EVENT!

My bike is put away for the season, and it’s time for me to get on foot to enjoy the outdoors again.  What better way to start than by hiking some trails at Beaver Brook in Hollis NH? Weather permitting of couse!  Please know that my intent is to enjoy the view of the area, and to chat along the way.  This event is meant more to have fun than to get a workout.   I thought that we would enjoy nature for about two or three hours, with a few breaks/stops along the trail.  This park is just full of beautiful views, so come and enjoy some fresh air, beautiful views, and all this while in good company of friends.

We will meet at 1:00 pm in the lot at the park entrance for Beaver Brook in Hollis NH.   

DIRECTIONS:  Take exit 6 from Route 3 (Route 130) and go west towards Brookline, stay on Route 130 (approximately 8 ½ miles) and take a left on Route 122 (Main St), travel just under a mile and take another right on Ridge Rd, continue until you see the entrance to the park..  Look for the meetup sign.

Please remember to bring plenty of fluids and to dress in layers so that you will be comfortable the whole time we are out on the trails. 

If anyone cares to, we can then go grab a bite to eat or enjoy a hot chocolate, at a nearby restaurant.

This event is at no cost.   I hope to see you there.
item.name: Easy hiking at Beaver Brook
